tool_description: Dataset with global top chart songs during 2022. With danceability, loudness, and energy metrics.
name: Spotify Top Charts 2022
title: Spotify Top Charts 2022

api_list.name: Spotify Music
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-top-charts-2022.p.rapidapi.com/spotify_top_charts_22"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-top-charts-2022.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-top-charts-2022.p.rapidapi.com/spotify_top_charts_22"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-top-charts-2022.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
